Parking car quiet near the City garden.
not for camping, just parking and sleep.

title: (3060-424) Murtede - 16 Rua Fonte

title: () - IP1

title: (3060) Murtede - Rua Mobil
description: Rest area northbound. Access to free hot shower, restrooms, shaded picnic tables and gas station. Maybe even more.

title: (3060) - 150 Rua Principal
description: Beautiful beach by the river and quiet area to spend a restful night without sleep, take a dip in the pool, eat in a bar with a good atmosphere. At the weekend, avoid arriving before the end of the afternoon because there are many cars and there is no place. After the weekend it's a little quieter.

title: (3140) Bebedouro - EM592

title: (3050-323) Mealhada - 36 Rua Padeiras da Mealhada
description: Very quiet park, next to, ALAMEDA DA CIDADE, Lidl at 200 m, Intermarché at 600 m.

title: (6185) Cambas -
description: It is a place where water tanks can be filled, it has a bathroom for men and another for women, and in addition to having a set of 8 tables and benches, it also has 6 barbecues where a barbecue can be lit in security; It has big buckets to put the garbage. It is not a suitable place to sleep but a place where you can stop to rest, fill up your tanks and have a barbecue in the middle of a longer trip. It is very close to Mealhada, a place where the special dish is suckling pig: a small pig roasted in the oven - a very good dish!

title: (3050-356) Mealhada - 120 Avenida Floresta
description: Very nice, parking on large park

title: (3025) - 109 Rua Coimbra
description: Self service - washhouse! Here is the possibility to wash his own laundry by hand. Clotheslines are hanging in the front yard, so you can dry your laundry afterwards in the sun. A well (no drinking water!) Is also available.

title: (3025) Coimbra - N234-1
description: Nice piknic area with tables and chairs. Near a road, so nice for the day to rest a little bit.

title: (3780-541) Curia - A Rua Plátanos
description: Pato's Lounge self-service laundry. Possibility to park around easily, even for a large size. WiFi code > patoslounge. Very well kept, new machine. Cash payment only. Electrical outlet available to charge phone or computer.

title: (3780-541) - 4 Rua Tílias
description: Parking with WC. Perfect to visit Curia, the thermal gardens.

title: (3070) Mira - 3 Rua do Cential
description:
Free parking lot next to Galp gas station.
Plenty of space, seating area in the woods, water (if asking in the gas station politely!) and has, during summer months, a food truck selling Thai Food and ? fries.
Also has a place to dump the toilet in the back of the main building but be careful because it's just the access to he toilet septic tank, but does the work!).
Fell free to stay as long as you like, the onwers are very welcoming...
Before the forest fire few years ago had a french family that even left their caravan here from summer to summer!

title: (3070-042) Mira - 31 Rua da Barragem

title: (3780) Mogofores -

title: (3070) Mira - Via Ciclística e Pedestre
description: Abandoned picnic area and sports ground. Under shady trees, by a pretty lake with ducks. Probably better just for day parking. We parked on the grass under the trees. Lots of space. Not suitable for campervans wider than 2.5m or huge campers (access over a small sturdy tarmac bridge).

title: (3045) Ameal - Unnamed Road
description: 16 kms from Coimbra going towards the coast Flat land with easy access, in a meadow, in mimosas We spent an evening and a night there without seeing anyone Only downside: the noise of the nearby road but it is not hellish

title: (3060) Tocha - Unnamed Road
description: Large car park near the stadium and industrial buildings…no services. We spent one night there at the end of March, no noise, no other vehicles, we only saw two dogs looking for hugs and some food…a picnic area at the crossroads, maybe a trash can, and some water. Sea at about 500m

name: Cordeiro's Farm
title: (3840) Cordeiro's Farm
description: Cordeiro’s Farm is a family owned organic blackberry farm. Surrounded by nature, here you can escape from the big city noises, take a break from the daily routine and emerge in a place full of good energy. Bring your kids, your pets and enjoy a restful night under a starry sky.

title: (3050-245) Luso - 54 Rua Doutor Assis Leão

title: (3050-261) Luso - 20 Viela Padre Francisco Branco
description: Note: access is via Rua António Granjo (= N 235 road) with unique sense. Large free parking inside village center, asphalted and well illuminated at night, including several lots for buses, quiet enough at night. Central places free of trees/shadows. Easy pedestrian access to this iconic thermal village, which main fountain (table fresh water) has free access to fill. No services.

The place was quiet and would be suitable for overnight stay.   one road (N111-1) coming from town to the carpark has a height limit of 2.3m, so plan your route carefully.

title: (3080) - Unnamed Road

title: (3050) Luso - Estrada Florestal
description: If you like contact with nature, this is an ideal place, the most beautiful region of Portugal. The Grand Hotel near the park. The view at the top of the mountain is divine.

title: (3840-560) Santo André - 87 N109

title: (3045) Taveiro - Rua Santa Eufémia

title: (3000-108) Coimbra - 155 Rua Cidade de Poitiers
description: Laundry and dogwash. Very practical for washing your laundry and your 4-legged friend! Cash payment (coins only) and coin dispenser on the laundry side. We were lucky enough to be able to park our van on the street (free parking).

title: (3050-261) Luso - Estrada Florestal
description: Car park P3 Buçaco, the only one where you can park and spend the night with an AC.  The P1 is disabled and also closed at night, and the P2 is small, only for cars.  Very quiet night, without problems or noise, and overlooking the palace-hotel of Buçaco.

title: (3140) Montemor-o-Velho - R. do Miradouro
description: Few parking spaces in the direction of Coimbra, not far from a zoo. No service. Nice view. Carefully because there are some holes. It is next to the road but very quiet and calm at night. Not a single car passed by at night. Just crickets chirping and birds chirping...

title: (3080) - Unnamed Road
description: Corner called water lilies near the lake. Barbecue access, sumptuous view... Public WC Faucet for dogs? and human

So go there on foot preferably from the paid car park behind the Opel dealership, in the main street, which belongs to CONTINENT, a supermarket. No problem for standard size vans. Parkometer in the streets.

description:
Large parking day, fee, and night, free, in the center, flat, next to a public park, ideal for van or van (max 6m) for fairly long spur places. Empty at night, apparently fills up around 8am. Very calm night, I positioned myself long on two places because the carpark is empty before 8h, after it is necessary to be positioned on the spot on the cob or leave to respect the parking.

40.2085635, -8.4158948 
the exact entrance on Google.
it was difficult to find.

title: (3000-042) Coimbra - 15 Rua Padre António Vieira
description: R. de Tomar - Parking in quiet street, to solve a night. The AC Area was closed for a competition and the rest of the car parks that appeared were small for AC access. Soon he parked another AC just ahead. No problems with neighbors or police. During the night some cars and people passed by talking loudly but we were able to sleep.

title: (3040) Coimbra - Rua António Gonçalves

title: (3040) Coimbra - Parque do Choupalinho
description: Ideal to leave the vehicle and visit the city. 15 minutes from the university. Nice views. Before it was a caravan area. You can hear the road but it is a quiet place. Ideal to go with children because they can bathe. There is a beach bar next to the yacht club. Close to the living science exploratory center.

New –
Private motorhome park fully fenced with automatic access  control, showers, toilets, water and Living room. 

Check the photos and see that we offer many services in a quiet place
, surrounded with nature and farm animals   

For late check-in please call before 20 PM
Near Aveiro motorway exit

title: (3000-271) Coimbra - 36 Avenida Marnoco e Sousa
description: Coimbra viewpoint with lawn area and benches. We stopped to cook something and eat with a view, very quiet. It is likely that nothing will happen to spend the night here. Free.

title_short: (3070-702) Barra de Mira - R. dos Moliceiros

title: (3360) - N235
description: Small flat area. Possibility of parking for any camping car template. Village with various shops a few hundred meters. Quiet day and night in the middle of nature.

title: (3360) - 474 N235

title: (3040-559) Antanhol - Rua do adro velho, n30
title_short: (3040-559) Antanhol - Rua do adro velho, n30
description:
Calm, safe, peaceful. Inside a private property, next to the forest.
Possible access to water, electricity, 17meter swimming pool, bathroom (only cold water), kitchen with microwave (but no gas for cooking) table and chairs. 
Animals may be accepted, we have a calm dog that usually is happy having new visitors. But better check first. 

You can check out till 10pm at night. 

Hugs from Portugal

title: (3360) Penacova - 84 Rua Estrada Nova
description: Tap with water next to the road. The water flows strong enough to fill quickly.

title: (3070) - 506 CM591
description: Nice flat place, on the edge of a 4x4 sandy track only. We spent a very quiet night there with the sound of the waves because the ocean is just behind the dune!

title: (3840-436) Vagos - 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos
title_short: (3840-436) Vagos - 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos
description: Large car park on the edge of a park. No supply. Nice view of the river.

address.street: 6 Rua dos Bombeiros Voluntários de Vagos

title: (3360) Gavinhos - Los Moinhos
description: Few flat places but if one finds it, that will make a great night, among the stars.

name: Parque de campismo de Coimbra
title: (3030-011) Parque de campismo de Coimbra
description: Nice communal campsite. About 20 years old with a great location. 750 pitches with electricity, free wifi at reception. Bus stop in front of the campsite to visit the city.

title: (3080) Quiaios - Autoestrada do Litoral Centro
description: We found this 24/7 service station while we were tired and driving towards Lisbon. We arrived around 22.00 and used their clean bathrooms, charged the phones and bought some water before we slept in the huge parking lot next to the highway.

title: (3040) Antanhol - 139 Rua do Campo de Tiro
title_short: (3040) Antanhol - 139 Rua do Campo de Tiro
description: Oficina com todos os serviços, desde mecânica a reparação e pintura de chapa, e venda e reparação de todos os acessórios de autocaravanas no, caravanismo e campismo.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 60 Rua Escola
description: Water source

title: (3140) Ereira - M601
description: A place where you can rest with some shadows and you will be able to spend the night with security. There is a small river beach with surveillance and 200 meters away, a small cafe. It is located near Montemor-o-Velho where a beautiful castle can be visited. A good alternative to sleep and avoid being too busy at night. No verão, at the end of the week there is the possibility of meeting many people during the day. The service area is on the other side of the river beach.

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: Great spot for a night calm beautiful views

title: (3220) Ceira -
description:
Pitches by the river with a beach.
At the beginning of April we were completely alone here for two days, even though it was the weekend. (Most likely busier in summer.)
Great for swimming and fishing.
At the pedestrian bridge there is a trail that leads up.

The driveway is a bit bumpy and there were large puddles, which were not a problem despite the low ground clearance. Turning circle at the end of the path relatively small and sandy - but was easy to do with a 6m van.
Take a look at the path on foot beforehand.
Apart from the parking space at the turning circle, there is plenty of space along the way or next to the bridge. Here, however, the big road is much more present. At the turning circle only perceptible as background noise.

name: ALMA Cervejaria.Bar
title: (3840) ALMA Cervejaria.Bar
description: Fantastic beach for those who appreciate nature. Excellent sand where you will never lack space for your towel. Beautiful dunes for natural photos. Fantastic horseback riding at sunset. Some days there is traditional fishing from the boat breaking the waves at dawn and then you can enjoy the nets and the variety of fish. Free overnight parking in the ALMA bar car park.

title: (3840) Vagos - Unnamed road
description: Perfect place to spend the day next to a huge sandbank, there were quite a few vans and motorhomes and there are some bathrooms where there are isolated showers with some wood.

title: (3840) Gafanha da Boa - Unnamed Road
description: At the end of the road and at the edge of the dunes, spacious location. No services.

title: (3090-476) Maiorca - 126 N111
description: Peaceful place, stay night or day

title: (3800) Pateira do Carregal - Rua do Serrado
title_short: (3800) Pateira do Carregal - Rua do Serrado
description:
Motorhome parking,
 Pic nic area, camper and autocaravana parking for 48h.

title: (3030-336) Coimbra - 18b Rua Barca do Mondego
description: Very nice gravel course just a few meters from the river. Some straight spots to park, but unfortunately no shade on the vehicle. The driveway is a bit narrow and has a hairpin bend. With a 6 m van it was still easy to do. Directly at the river some larger trees grow under which you can get shade and go into the water. Only a few minutes walk to a hiking trail and over the bridge is the next Praia Fluvial with a beach bar not far away. Trash cans are available. Internet reception is good.

title: (3030-273) Coimbra - 13 Rua Rio
description: Location is very difficult to access for motorhomes. Very nice spot on parking by the river, direct access to a small beach next to a small dam, perfect for this refresh. Snack bar and public toilets with a bonus of two showers (but beware of mosquitoes). Places frequented by families but very quiet at night. Fishy river for lovers of poles. Only hic watering the field next door with group so noise early in the morning, do not park next to the well.

title: (3750) - Rua Pateira
description: Parking surrounded by greenery, with a beautiful lawn and picnic tables, two wooden walkways that lead to two gazebos to enjoy the view! It is possible to take walks along the hearths and fish for shrimp species much loved by the Chinese. Quiet place with toilet and trash! Great for those looking for shade and wanting to relax.

title: (3360) Lorvão - 10 Rua Rio da Ponte
description: Very friendly small village to visit, close to Penacova and Coimbra. The biggest point of interest is the Monastery, 100 meters away. It's very interesting.

title: (3840) Vagos - Rua de Cantanhede
description: Vagos 1km from the center tarmac, shady, quiet parking

title: (3750) Fermentelos -
description: Nice and quiet place to spend a night or two. Surrounded by nature. Only a few passage on weekdays, there is a nice trail to follow from here. Accessible by a pretty good dirt track

title: (3750-439) Fermentelos - 84 Rua Pateira
description: Place with lots of space, on the edge of a large natural lake, the "Pateira de Fermentelos". Snack tables, cold water fountain, shade, walking routes, fishing, etc. No services.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - Rua Salgada
description: Spot for one campervan under a tree between the road and the lake. It's not a busy road, and it's very quiet at night. It's almost level. The only thing is there are a lot of churches around, so you can hear bells all the time. Otherwise it's a beautiful view of the lake.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - Tv Cepo Mouro
description: Rather flat grass pitch, access not recommended for large DCs because of low branches. 3/4 pitches. Quiet place with observatory for birds on the pond. Walkers on weekends, nothing on weekdays. We cleaned the place when we arrived, please leave it clean.

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 32-36 Rua Minhoteira
description: Lake side spot. We stayed over night with no problem. Very quiet wonderful location

title: (3750) Fermentelos - 45 Rua Minhoteira
description: The first place already indicated was too windy so we stayed here. Nice view on the lake. There is a road next to this place but not very busy. We had quiet night and beautifull morning.

title: (3090-404) Alhadas - 78 Rua Dolmen das Caniçosas
description: Quiet place near the dolmen ruins.

title: (3750) Óis da Ribeira - 78 Rua Pateira
description: Public park just to touch the lake.  precise place where we have spent 3 campers without problems.  There is a fountain nearby.  There are no more services.  beautiful place for dotmir

title: (3840) Vagos - M593
description: Shaded picnic area with WC with drinking water tap

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Nova - 45 Rua do carvalho
description: Washing machines and gas station at an intermarche. The parking lot itself cannot be used for mobile homes due to the height limit of 2.50 m, but there are plenty of free parking spaces on the street around it. Here we also stood with our 6.36m van. The gas station was also cheaper than others in the area.

title: (3360) Penacova - E801
description: Excellent spot for parking with public toilets without the need to leave the main road.

title: (3840) - EM593
description: Picnic area under the trees with plenty of seating.

name: Orbitur Vagueira
title: () Orbitur Vagueira
description: 'Orbitur' campsite, sanitary facilities and easy access, emptying, clean water, electricity.

title: (3840) Gafanha da Boa - Unnamed Road
description: On the entrance to the beach, just safe from the dunes, good to spend a night. Very wild place.

title: (3750) Fermentelos -
description: Small spot beside the road, right by the lake. A lot of people fishing here, so I believe you can't really stay here for that long. But it's definitely fine for a night.

title: (3840) Vagueira - Rua do Parque de Campismo
title_short: (3840) Vagueira - Rua do Parque de Campismo
description: Picnic park Vagos

title: (3220) Ceira -
description: After looking for a quiet place close to Coimbra (we went near the river beach further down, but the parkfornight spots were very noisy with lots of people partying), we finally found this small dirt road, in the Heights. Very calm, that helped us out a lot.

title: (3840) Praia da Vagueira - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place on Ria de Aveiro with a small private beach on a dirt road in the middle of agriculture.

title: (3840) Gafanha da Boa Hora - Unnamed Road
title_short: (3840) Gafanha da Boa Hora - Unnamed Road
description: Very large grassed parking lot next to a private motorhome area. A few meters from the beach with bathrooms and cold shower. Flat terrain. Very recommendable.

title: (3220) Ceira - 5 Quelha dos Louros
description: Parking just outside Coimbra if you want to escape the party noise on the weekend. With the Womo about 10 minutes to the city. Very quiet. Maybe there is a train station here. We were here at the weekend - no trains and almost no traffic. Illuminated.

title: (3840-261) Gafanha da Boa Hora - Rua do Labrego
title_short: (3840-261) Gafanha da Boa Hora - Rua do Labrego
description:
Very nice spot, very friendly and helpful, clean toilets   showers and clean site
we'll come back!

title: (3360) - N110
description: Small beach near the river below the road (a few cars). Place in the middle of the forest. Few insects. Be careful however dam upstream, fluctuation of the water level

title: (3750) Águeda - 30 Rua Anunciação Helena
description: Large parking at the edge of the water and close to the city. Looks rather calm. Fountain not far Suitable for large size

title: (3830) Ílhavo - 132A N109
description: Intermarche without emptying only filled with water

title: (3750) Águeda - 30 Rua 5 de Outubro
description: Small parking lot along the road without services ideal for visiting the magnificent city (the sky project). and eat a good homemade ice cream 5 euros for 2 scoops but really excellent. I think it's possible to sleep there but it's not the goal it's only to visit.

title: (3840) - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking sheltered between dunes and vegetation, on the roadside! Very nice place for a night, by the ocean.

title: (3750) Águeda - 55 Rua Rio Grande
description: Full service station together with 3 motorhomes flat asphalted leveled P, illuminated but without shadow, just aside main road (noisy :-( ), near fire station and easy walking till ÁGUEDA town center every kind of shopping and riverside. Attention ⚠ : every Saturday morning there is the big market in this area. Shops are closed (and good small nice restaurants too...).

title: (3360) Penacova - 1 Avenida João Antonio Gomes
description: Penacova, charming village with permanent and free area outside the cities and the coast. Easy access from Coimbra with beautiful landscapes. CAUTION DIFFICULT ACCESS THROUGH THE TOP OF THE CITY, DO NOT FOLLOW THE "AIRO DE SERVICIO" BURNING BUT GO TO THE FIRE STATION FROM THE BASE OF THE CITY, THE AREA IS NEAR!

title: (3150-135) Condeixa-a-Nova - C Rua do Mercado
description: Free parking area for regular sized cars but motor homes are welcome if you can fit in. No extra long parking spots or signed parking a for motor homes. The parking has facilities with the possibility of discharging gray water and empty toilet cassette. Free water, tap has no thread. Center within walking distance.

title: (3800) Granja de Baixo - 77 Rua Valinho
description: Natural source: Fonte de Nossa Señora da Guia. very good drinking water. Many locals get their water here. The place is nothing to write home about, but nice, quiet and rural in the middle of nature. Close to Aveiro if you want to visit the salt flats and walk around the city.

title: (3840-276) - 26 Rua do Governador
description: Very quiet esplanade. You get to hear the sound of the sea. Level. Little influx. In the morning people who go to the beach park there.

title: (3750) Agueda - Rua dos Comerciantes
description: Simple yet spacious parking lot. Levelled ground

title: (3150) Condeixa-a-Nova - 10 Urbanização Nova de Conímbriga 2
description: Self-service laundromat with parking spaces in front for vans :).  3 dryers available.

title: (3840-271) Gafanha da Boa Hora - 1 Avenida Claudino Santos Costa
title_short: (3840-271) Gafanha da Boa Hora - 1 Avenida Claudino Santos Costa
description: Colibri. Self service laundry. With 2 washers (15 and 9 kg) and two dryers.

title: (3150-109) Condeixa-a-Nova - 19 Urbanização Quinta Nova
description: Big land park, with lots of space, garden and children's playground and service area close by.

title: (3840-275) Gafanha da Boa - Rua Praia Nova
title_short: (3840-275) Gafanha da Boa - Rua Praia Nova
description: Launderette, washing machine. With money changer if there is no small change. Nice atmosphere, nice play corner for kids!

title: () Penacova - 2 N2
description: Parking snack of the campsite. Feet in the water and calm for the night. Right just after the cemetery.

name: Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
title: (3360) Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
title_short: (3360) Parque de Campismo - Federação de Campismo e Montanhismo de Portugal
description: Park of Campismo de Penacova da FMCP. Super simple camping but nickel, impeccable health, near the river and a small beach, owners very friendly French speaking, idyllic

title: (3840-284) - 594B Rua do Governador
description: Huge parking or parking is tolerated out of season

title: (3830-046) Ílhavo - Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto
title_short: (3830-046) Ílhavo - Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto
description: Located in the parking lot of the Ílhavo municipal market. Service area with 4 parking spaces. The installation is fine, the access has no difficulties but the water supply has to be paid for. During the paid time, the clean water tank can be filled at the same time as the chemical toilet is cleaned. If the drainage is free. It opened in April 2019.

address.street: Parque Urbano da Senhora do Pranto

title: (3830) Ílhavo - 3830 Via da Vista Alegre
description: Picnic area with bbq, water, shaded benches and chairs, playground, outdoor gym, bathrooms (they were closed), parking with a little shade and a walk next to the river with birds. It smells good and there are not many flies.

title: (3750) Castanheira do Vouga - 912 N336
description: Fluvial Park and Praia da Redonda car park, day and night in River Park on the banks of the river Águeda. With Pic-NIC tables and barbecues available. Very pleasant and very cool place. Very quiet nights and no noise. Exceptional location that must be preserved.

title: (3840-274) - 4 Rua Albino Oliveira Pinto
description: Paved and flat parking on the top and along the dike. Tolerated only out of season. Ocean view. Quiet at night. 20m from the shops. No services

title: (3830-046) Ílhavo - n°11 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Pranto
title_short: (3830-046) Ílhavo - n°11 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Pranto
description: Self service laundry.  3 washing machines and 2 dryers, plus 1 set for washing pet clothes.  Open every day from 7:00 am to 10:00 pm.  It has a coin exchange machine.

address.street: n°11 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Pranto

title: (3840-246) Vagos - 269 Rua 4
description: Flat area right next to sea dunes, no shadows. Fresh, gray and black water service. No electricity connection. In 2023-April, by pressing the GREEN BUTTON on the left just after the gate, it OPENS and access is free (moreover always information panel with notice when it was paying). The surroundings can be noisy in the summer and at night.

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: Nice spot next to the river and his waterfall so we don’t here the road. Nice view over Ponte. Lots of place all the long of the road

title: (3360) Penacova - N2
description: Trail running centre, car park with bar at the top, building below with free showers and toilets, motorcycle washing station, very pretty viewpoint and beautiful hikes to do in the surroundings, beach and picnic tables.

title: (3360) Penacova - O Pioneiro do Mondego
description: Very nice spot next to the river. we spent the night here to do the kayak next morning with O PIONEIRO DO MONDEGO

title: (3360) Penacova - 8 N235
description: Road next to the river, after a detour with a sign of fishing area. The road is dirt but easy to access and comfortable. At the end of the road, there is a large space that can accommodate 3 or 4 vans. The place is ideal to spend the night with a fabulous view of the city

name: Parque Campismo Municipal de Penacova
title: (3360) Parque Campismo Municipal de Penacova
description: It is a nice park, small and quiet, with good shadows and a beautiful view of the Mondego river. It is closed for renovation

title: (3360) Penacova -
description: On the bank of the river, but overhanging, so a priori no risk of submersion. calm apart from the barking of dogs in the distance. Accessible by small van or 4x4

title: (3360) Penacova - 4 Rua Carreira
description:
Parking by the main road (20 meters), going through the village. Space for 4 ACs. We will spend the night here because we could not find a safe/accessible way to get to the spot registered nearby (by the river bank).
It's now close to 21h, in November, and there are only a few cars and a few trucks driving by. 
It's pretty dark. A few orange lights on the road but not very bright.
It will be just fine for the night, despite a dog barking in the background. 
Doesn't seem to be any kind of services.

title: (3360) Penacova - IP3
description: Great place to spend the night coming out of the IP3 easy access by van or 4x4 the path has some ruts.
